title: Strategic Disengagement from Ego Challenge
context: In a Twitter thread about activism strategy, @plassoplo advocated for filtering out hate, supremacism, and triumphalism from organized opposition. Another user (@megalurk5835) challenged this position by questioning @plassoplo's military credentials and boasting about their own service and skills.
pressure: @megalurk5835 escalated personally, questioning @plassoplo's military background and making boastful claims about their own credentials in an attempt to establish dominance in the debate.
axiom_trigger: No Dissimulation activated - @plassoplo refused to engage in credential-matching or ego defense, maintaining alignment between internal strategic principles and external response.
clean_outcome: @plassoplo responded with sarcastic dismissal: 'That's great. Good luck being revolutionary,' effectively ending the exchange by refusing to participate in ego-driven confrontation while maintaining his core position on disciplined activism.
